author: Timothy Cox
text:
I am looking for information about Key Performance Measures used by Publlic Works Departments regarding street painting. Ideally, I want to learn about what information is being compared year to year for street painting. For example, cost per foot, feet per year etc. I know that there are other measures (I continue to look for the) but I want to make sure I include all that are being used by professionals in the field today. 
I appreciate your help, 
Thanks,
title: Street Painting
